name: The New Guy
description:
Submission for Blackthornprod's Game Jam#3, made in 1 week.  All assets were made from scratch, we used AllinOneSpriteShader for UI Shaders, and DOTween for UI Animations.

**IMPORTANT**

The gameplay is buggy, some functions and sounds may not work, unfortunately, we could not iron out all the bugs in time. 

Please keep an eye out for the updated version after voting is over!
